ValidationRule.description: The BC Case Reason field is mandatory after the FR and before doing anything else.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(
NOT(ISNEW()),
RecordTypeId = '0128F000000W684QAC', /*Technical Support*/ ISBLANK(TEXT( New_Case_Reason__c )), IF((NOW()-First_Response__c)*24*60 > 1, true, false),
OR( $UserRole.Name = "Technical Support Manager", $UserRole.Name = "Technical Support Rep" ),
ISPICKVAL($User.CS_Role__c , "CSR"), $UserRole.DeveloperName <> "Sales_Service_Desk", $UserRole.DeveloperName <> "Salesforce_Team" )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: BC Case Reason required before saving the record
